pages.text: With a Brazier, many different things can be done. An item can be added or removed with a right click, or automation. Adding some water with a bucket makes it safe to land on the Brazier from a high height, and makes it extinguish you if you stand on it. Adding lava instead makes it set things on it on fire, so it can be used as a trash can for items that won't set the area on fire.

A coal block makes it burn, letting off light. It doesn't use up the coal. Similarly, a glowstone block also makes it glow at light level 15. More interesting than the other effects though is that if you put a block of salt in it, it prevents the spawning of witches in a large area. It has a radius of #brazier_range# blocks.
